painPoints: Chronic inflammation that medication doesn't fully address
Confused by conflicting nutrition advice (keto, vegan, paleo, carnivore)
Autoimmune conditions with no clear dietary guidance from doctors
Feeling exhausted and foggy despite eating 'healthy'
Taking multiple medications and wanting a natural approach
Digestive issues that affect quality of life (bloating, IBS, acid reflux)
Wanting to help others with nutrition but no professional framework
terminology: Anti-inflammatory eating - dietary approach focusing on foods that reduce systemic inflammation
N.O.U.R.I.S.H. Method - Navigate, Optimize, Understand, Remove, Introduce, Sustain, Heal framework
5 Root Causes - Blood sugar dysregulation, gut dysfunction, chronic inflammation, nutrient deficiencies, toxic overload
Elimination protocol - systematic removal of common trigger foods to identify sensitivities
Nutrient density - maximizing vitamins, minerals, and phytonutrients per calorie consumed
Gut healing foods - bone broth, fermented foods, collagen-rich proteins, prebiotic fiber
Scope of practice - educate and coach on nutrition without diagnosing conditions or replacing medical care
clientExamples: Women 40-60 with autoimmune conditions seeking dietary support
Those dealing with chronic inflammation, joint pain, or fatigue
People overwhelmed by conflicting nutrition information
Women wanting to reduce dependence on medications through food changes
Anyone experiencing digestive issues like bloating, IBS, or food sensitivities
Health-conscious women who know food matters but need guidance on WHAT to eat
practiceType: Nutrition coaching focused on anti-inflammatory eating, elimination protocols, meal planning, gut health support, and whole-food healing approaches
